text.text_translated:
Packaging is the plastic or paper around food.
For ten years, people said the big supermarkets did many bad things. They threw away a lot of food. They did not pay their suppliers enough money. They also used too much plastic packaging for their food. This plastic made a lot of rubbish. This was bad for our environment.
But now, many customers are very angry about the plastic rubbish. Because of this, the supermarkets are listening. Some of the biggest UK supermarkets made a special promise together. They will change their packaging. They will use less plastic.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Packaging is the plastic or paper around food.
For ten years, many people were very angry with the big supermarkets. They said the supermarkets did many wrong things. They threw away a lot of food. They did not pay their suppliers enough money. They also used too much plastic packaging for their food. This plastic made a lot of rubbish. This was bad for our environment.
But now, many customers are very angry about the plastic rubbish. Because of this, the supermarkets are listening. Some of the biggest UK supermarkets made an important agreement. They will change their packaging. They will use less plastic.
